title: Synthesis and characterization of magnetic carbonaceous materials from bamboo waste and investigation of their adsorption capability for cesium ions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2005-2014
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00149D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Fumihiko Ogata, Noriaki Nagai, Taiki Ogawa, Yugo Uematsu, Chalermpong Saenjum, Shigeharu Tanei, Naohito Kawasaki
In this work, we prepared a series of magnetic carbonaceous materials (CB200F, CB400F, CB600F, CB800F, and CB1000) from waste bamboo (RB) for the removal of cesium ions from water.
